Bud & Alley’s Bourbon Event
January 22, 2026
Capacity - 200 seats
Get ready for a bold and flavorful evening at Bud & Alley’s annual Bourbon Event on January 22nd, 2026. Guests will savor rich pours of top-shelf bourbons, thoughtfully paired with savory, smoky bites that highlight the best of Southern charm. This exclusive experience is designed for those who appreciate indulgence, craftsmanship, and connection. In previous years, the night has featured cigars and live music, and while details for 2026 are still being finalized, guests can expect the same elevated atmosphere.
Attendance will be limited to 200 guests, ensuring an intimate and memorable experience.
